## Courses/lectures

- The course [Introduction to Machine learning (I2ML)](https://slds-lmu.github.io/i2ml/) is a free and open flipped classroom course on the basics of machine learning. `mlr3` is used in the [demos](https://github.com/slds-lmu/lecture_i2ml/tree/master/code-demos-pdf) and [exercises](https://github.com/slds-lmu/lecture_i2ml/tree/master/exercises).

## Peer-reviewed Articles

A more scientific view on our the packages and the packages we depend on.

* @mlr3: about the base package `r ref_pkg("mlr3")`
* @mlr3pipelines: building machine learning pipelines with `r ref_pkg("mlr3pipelines")`
* @mlr3proba: probabilistic regression with `r ref_pkg("mlr3proba")` (including survival analysis)
* @future: the parallelization framework package `r ref_pkg("future")` we build upon
* @checkmate: package `r ref_pkg("checkmate")` for argument checking and defensive programming
* @batchtools: parallelization framework `r ref_pkg("batchtools")` for high-performance computing clusters, used via `r ref_pkg("future")` or `r ref_pkg("mlr-org/mlr3batchmark")`
